ly.priv.mobile

Class TwitterLinkGrabberService

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • ly.priv.mobile.TwitterLinkGrabberService

  • public class TwitterLinkGrabberService
extends Activity
    Grabs Privly links from a twitter user's timeline and stores them in the local database.

    Dependencies :

    • /privly-android/libs/signpost-commonshttp4-1.2.1.2.jar
    • /privly-android/libs/signpost-core-1.2.1.2.jar
    • /privly-android/libs/twitter4j-core-3.0.3.jar

    • Checks if a user has already granted permissions to the application.
    • If yes, fetch the Access Token data using TwitterHelperMethods Class. If not, Redirect user to authentication link
    • Setup the Twitter Object using Access Token and Consumer Data : Consumer Key and Consumer Secret

    Author:
    Shivam Verma

      • onCreate

        protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)

      • loginToTwitter

        private void loginToTwitter()
        Fires up an Intent which allows the twitter user to grant permission to the the Privly app. The User is then redirected to the callback url.

      • onNewIntent

        protected void onNewIntent(Intent intent)
        Handles the new intent received after the user authorizes the Privly app with twitter permissions.

      • setUpTwitter

        private void setUpTwitter(java.lang.String token,
                java.lang.String tokenSecret)
        Creates a new twitter AccessToken Object and then sets up the twitter object with AccessToken, ConsumerKey and Consumer Secret.
        Parameters:
        {String} - token
        {String} - tokenSecret

      • getTweets

        public void getTweets(long userId)
        Fetch tweets from the twitter timeline. Looks for any Privly links in the tweets and store them in the Db.
        Parameters:
        {long} - userId Twitter user id for which we want to fetch the timeline.
